post.body: as we speak (tweet) I am writing up thoughts about my brand(s). Have no problem paying, I am in the same freelance world.
I believe that @whiteafrican has been using the Nikon D60 with no regrets.
#styletime pointed me ur way. What do you charge 4 logo design? Nothing major-mostly personal/misson. Looking for 2-3 logos.
yeah, my motto is the same, get what you pay for, just don't have much $ as a missionary for stuff like that. Will contact imjc
thanks for the heads up? Are they asking for fees? Just a road block? What's the deal?
don't have a vehicle yet but researched the tire thing and found out the same. CRAZY expensive in Africa! Don't buy cheap though
rt #TG09 I am tweeting to find new friends in my new home of Nairobi and Sudan. Also to network about media in Africa.
would love to hear more about what you're doing, where you live, where you want to go. Can you direct msg me? I will gv u my email.
how is it that we never crossed paths? Looks like we share common friends/projects. Dallas was home until I just moved to SDN/KENYA
new HDR plugin coming out for Aperture shortly...
thanks for the rt on the new site.
refering to your 'is this thing on' tweet.
yeah, God/Christ is sort of my whole basis in discussions about these kind of things. I'm reminded of Ross in "Friends".
anyone use a cheap online service for a logo? How did you like the result? Would you do again with them? Someone else?
Who said you can't have your cake and eat it to? http://obamainkenya.com
Kenya media gag law signed by President and now in effect... http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/7808815.stm
whoops, check here... http://tinyurl.com/9ctapr
My recent visit out to the rift valley... http://tinyurl.com/7x2r48
New pics of Obama in Kenya... http://www.obamainkenya.com/
eating some yummy home made cinnamon rolls in Africa!
